description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将。曾任空军航空兵第42师师长、成都军区空军副参谋长、空军武器试验基地司令员、东部战区副司令员，现任联勤保障部队司令员。他也是中国共产党第二十届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army Air Force. He has served as commander of the 42nd Air Division, deputy chief of staff of the Chengdu Military Region Air Force, commander of the PLA Air Force Weapon Test Base, deputy commander of the Eastern Theater Command, and is currently the commander of the Joint Logistics Support Force. He is also an alternate member of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省下辖的地级市，王抗平的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hunan Province, the birthplace of Wang Kangping.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设的大军区空军之一，王抗平曾在此担任副参谋长。
description.en: One of the former military region air forces of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Kangping served as deputy chief of staff.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军武器试验基地

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军武器试验基地
en: People's Liberation Army Air Force Weapon Test Base

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的武器试验机构，王抗平曾担任该基地司令员。
description.en: A weapon testing institution of the PLA Air Force, where Wang Kangping served as commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五大战区之一，王抗平曾在此担任副司令员。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Kangping served as deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的后勤保障力量，王抗平于2024年10月起担任司令员。
description.en: The logistics support force of the People's Liberation Army, with Wang Kangping serving as its commander since October 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的军衔等级之一。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军中将

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将
en: People's Liberation Army Air Force Lieutenant General

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的军衔等级之一。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府，王抗平为该校校友。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army, of which Wang Kangping is an alumnus.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，王抗平为候补委员。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China, where Wang Kangping serves as an alternate member.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 王抗平是湖南益阳人。
description.en: Wang Kangping is a native of Yiyang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 王抗平曾任成都军区空军副参谋长。
description.en: Wang Kangping once served as the Deputy Chief of Staff of the Chengdu Military Region Air Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军武器试验基地

description.zh-cn: 王抗平于2017年12月至2021年6月期间担任空军武器试验基地司令员。
description.en: Wang Kangping served as the Commander of the Air Force Weapon Test Base from December 2017 to June 2021.

description.zh-cn: 王抗平于2021年6月至2024年10月期间担任东部战区副司令员。
description.en: Wang Kangping served as the Deputy Commander of the Eastern Theater Command from June 2021 to October 2024.

description.zh-cn: 王抗平于2024年10月调任联勤保障部队司令员。
description.en: In October 2024, Wang Kangping was transferred to the position of Commander of the Joint Logistics Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 王抗平于2014年7月晋升空军少将军衔。
description.en: Wang Kangping was promoted to the rank of Air Force Major General in July 2014.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军中将

description.zh-cn: 王抗平于2021年6月晋升空军中将军衔。
description.en: Wang Kangping was promoted to the rank of Air Force Lieutenant General in June 2021.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，王抗平是中国人民解放军国防大学的校友。
description.en: According to category information, Wang Kangping is an alumnus of the PLA National Defence University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，王抗平是中国共产党第二十届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: According to category information, Wang Kangping is an alternate member of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，王抗平是中华人民共和国建立后加入中国共产党的党员。
description.en: According to category information, Wang Kangping joined the Communist Party of China after the founding of the People's Republic of China.
